arabicText: كَدَأْبِ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ ۙ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّۭ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “What	 do	 you	 wait	 for	 to	 happen to	
us,	 except	 one	 of	 the	 two	 good	 things?*	
And	 for	 you,	 we	 look	 forward	 to	 Allah
afflicting	 you	 with	 a	 punishment	 from	Himself	 or	 by	 our	 hands;	 so	 wait	- we	 too	 await	 with	
you.”	(*Death	in	Allah’s	way	or	victory.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tum	farmāo tum	hum	par	kis	cheez	ka	intezār	karte	ho	magar	do	khoobiyoñ	meiñ	se	ek	ka	aur	
hum	tum	par	is	intezār	meiñ	haiñ	ke	Allah	tum	par	‘aƶāb	dāle	apne	pās	se	ya	hamāre	hāthoñ	to	
ab	rāh	dekho	(intezār	karo)	hum	bhi	tumhāre	sāth	rāh	dekh	rahe	haiñ.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمْ يَكُ مُغَيِّرًۭا نِّعْمَةً أَنْعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا۟ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Spend	willingly	or	with	a	heavy	heart,	it	will	never	be	accepted	from	you;	indeed	you	are	a	
disobedient	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo		ke	dil	se	kharch	karo	ya	na-gawāri	se	tum	se	hargiz	qabool	na	hoga	be-shak		tum	
be-ḥukm	(na-farmān)		log	ho.

arabicText: كَدَأْبِ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ ۙ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَأَغْرَقْنَآ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ وَكُلٌّۭ كَانُوا۟ ظَـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 their	spending	was	not	stopped	being	accepted,	except	because	 they	disbelieved	in	Allah
and	His	Noble	Messenger,	and	 they	come	 to	prayer	with	heavy	hearts,	and	 they	do	not	spend	
except	unwillingly.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	woh	jo	kharch	karte	haiñ	uska	qabool	hona	band	na	huwa	magar	isi	liye	ke	woh	Allah-oRasool	se	munkir	huwe	aur	Namāz	ko	nahi	āatey magar	ji	hāre	(susti	ki	hālat	meiñ)	aur	kharch	
nahi	karte	magar	na-gawāri	se.

arabicText: بَرَآءَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Severance of	 ties	 is	 proclaimed	 by	 Allah
and	 on	 behalf	 of	 His	 Noble	 Messenger,	
towards	 the	 polytheists	 with	 whom	 you	
had	a	treaty.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bezāri	ka	ḥukm sunāna	hai	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	ki	taraf	se	un	mushrikoñ	ko	jin	se	
tumhāra	 mu'āhida	 tha	 aur	 woh	 qāim	 na	
rahe.

arabicText: فَسِيحُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍۢ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْزِى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Travel	 freely	in	 the	land	 for	 four	months,	
and	bear	in	mind	 that	 you	cannot	escape	
from	 Allah,	 and	 that	 Allah will	 humiliate	
the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 chār	 mahine	 zameen	 par	 chalo	 phiro	
aur	jān	rakho	ke	 tum	Allah	ko	 thaka	nahi	
sakte	 aur	 yeh	 ke	 Allah	 kāfiroñ	 ko	 ruswa	
karne	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَأَذَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَجِّ ٱلْأَكْبَرِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ۙ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ۚ فَإِن تُبْتُمْ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
englishTranslationText:
And	 proclaim	 from	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	
Messenger	 to	 all	 men	 on	 the	 day	 of	 the	
Great	 Pilgrimage	 (Haj)	 that	 Allah is	
disgusted	 with	 the	 polytheists,	 and	 so	 is	
His	Noble	Messenger;	so	if	you	repent it	is	
better	 for	you;	but	if	you	turn	away,	then	
know	 that	 you	cannot	escape	 from	Allah;	
and	give	 the	disbelievers	 the	glad	 tidings	
of	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	manādi	pukār	dena	hai	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	 ki	 taraf	 se	 sab	 logoñ	 meiñ	 bade	
Hajj	 ke	 din	 ke	Allah	 bezār	 hai	mushrikoñ	
se	aur	uska	Rasool	to	agar	tum	tauba	karo	
to	 tumhāra	 bhala	 hai	 aur	 agar	 moñh	
phero	 to	jān	lo	 ke	 tum	Allah	 ko	 na	 thaka	
sakoge	aur	kāfiroñ	ko	khush	khabri	sunāo	
dard-nāk	‘aƶāb	ki.

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَنقُصُوكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَمْ يُظَـٰهِرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ أَحَدًۭا فَأَتِمُّوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ عَهْدَهُمْ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Other	 than	 those	 polytheists	 with	 whom	
you	 had	 a	 treaty,	 and	 they	 have	 not	
diminished	anything	from	your	treaty	nor	
supported	anyone	against	you	- therefore	
fulfil	 their	 treaty	 up	 to	 the	 appointed	
term;	indeed	Allah befriends	the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	 woh	 mushrik	 jin	 se	 tumhāra	
mu'āhida	 tha	 phir	 unhoñ	 ne	 tumhāre	
‘ahed	meiñ	kuchh	kami	na	ki	aur	tumhāre	
muqābil	kisi	ko	madad	na	di	to	unka	‘ahed	
thehri	 huyi	 muddat	 tak	 poora	 karo	 beshak	 	 Allah	 parhez-gāroñ	 ko	 dost	 rakhta	
hai.

arabicText: فَإِذَا ٱنسَلَخَ ٱلْأَشْهُرُ ٱلْحُرُمُ فَٱقْتُلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ وَخُذُوهُمْ وَٱحْصُرُوهُمْ وَٱقْعُدُوا۟ لَهُمْ كُلَّ مَرْصَدٍۢ ۚ فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَخَلُّوا۟ سَبِيلَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 when	 the	 sacred	 months	 have	
passed,	slay	the	polytheists	wherever	you	
find	them,	and	catch	them	and	make	them	
captive,	and	wait	in	ambush	 for	 them	at	every	place;	 then	if	 they	 repent and	 keep	 the	prayer	
established	 and	 pay	 the	 charity,	 leave	 their	 way	 free;	 indeed	 Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	
Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Phir	jab	hurmat	wāle	mahine	nikal	jāyeñ	to	mushrikon	ko	māro	jahān	pāo	aur	unheiñ	pakdo	aur	
qaid	 karo	 aur	 har	 jagah	 unki	 tāk	 meiñ	 baitho	 phir	 agar	 woh	 tauba	 kareiñ	 aur	 namāz	 qāim	
rakheiñ	aur	zakāt	deñ	to	unki	rāh	chhod	do	be-shak		Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: وَإِنْ أَحَدٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ٱسْتَجَارَكَ فَأَجِرْهُ حَتَّىٰ يَسْمَعَ كَلَـٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ أَبْلِغْهُ مَأْمَنَهُۥ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	if	a	polytheist	seeks	your	
protection,	give	him	protection	so	that	he	may	hear	the	Word	of	Allah,	and	then	transport	him	
to	his	place	of	safety;	this	is	because	they	are	an	unwise	people.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	Mehboob!	Agar	 koi	mushrik	 tum	 se	 panah	māñge	 to	 usey	 panah	 do	 ke	woh	Allah	 ka	
kalām	sune	phir	usey	uski	aman	ki	jagah	pahuñcha	do	yeh	is	liye	ke	woh	nadān	log	haiñ.

arabicText: كَيْفَ يَكُونُ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ عَهْدٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ رَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّمْ عِندَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ ۖ فَمَا ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ لَكُمْ فَٱسْتَقِيمُوا۟ لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
How	can	there	be	a	treaty	with	Allah and	
with	 His	 Noble	 Messenger	 for	 the	
polytheists,	 except	 for	 those	 with	 whom	
you	 made	 a	 treaty	 near	 the	 Sacred	
Masjid?	So	as	long	as	they	remain	firm	on	
the	treaty	for	you,	you	too	remain	firm	for	
them;	 indeed	 Allah is	 pleased	 with	 the	
pious.	.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mushrikoñ	 ke	 liye	 Allah	 aur	 uske	 Rasool	
ke	 pās	 koi	 ‘ahed	 kyuñ	 kar	 hoga	 magar	
woh	 jin	 se	 tumhāra	 mu'āhida	 Masjid-eHarām ke	 pās	 huwa	 to	 jab	 tak	 woh	
tumhāre	 liye	 ‘ahed	 par	 qāim	 raheiñ	 tum	
unke	 liye	 qāim	 raho	 be-shak	 	 parhez-gār	
Allah	ko	khush	āatey		haiñ.

arabicText: كَيْفَ وَإِن يَظْهَرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ لَا يَرْقُبُوا۟ فِيكُمْ إِلًّۭا وَلَا ذِمَّةًۭ ۚ يُرْضُونَكُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتَأْبَىٰ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	how	- when	 they	are	such	 that	
if	 they	gain	 control	 over	 you,	 they	would	
not	 have	 regard	 for	any	 relations	 nor	 for	
any	 treaty?	 They	 please	 you	 with	 their	
mouths	 whereas	 their	 hearts	 contain	
rejection;	 and	 most	 of	 them	 are	
disobedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bhala	kyuñ	kar	unka	hāl	to	yeh	hai	ke	tum	
par	 qābu	 pāyeñ	 to	 na	 qarābat	 ka	 lihāz	
kareiñ		na	‘ahed	ka	apne	moñh	se	tumheiñ		
rāzi	karte	haiñ	aur	unke	diloñ	meiñ	inkār	
hai	aur	un	meiñ	aksar	be	ḥukm		haiñ.

arabicText: ٱشْتَرَوْا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنًۭا قَلِيلًۭا فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	exchanged	the	verses	of	Allah for	an	
abject	price,	therefore	prevented	from	His	
way;	 indeed	 what	 they	 do	 is	 extremely	
evil.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ki	āayatoñ		ke	badle	thode	dām	mol	
liye	 to	 uski	 rāh	 se	 roka	 be-shak	 	 woh	
bahut	hi	bure	kām	karte	haiñ.

arabicText: لَا يَرْقُبُونَ فِى مُؤْمِنٍ إِلًّۭا وَلَا ذِمَّةًۭ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُعْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
In	 respect	 of	 the	 Muslims,	 they	 do	 not	
keep	 regard	 for	 any	 relations	 nor	 any	
pacts;	it	is	they	who	are	the	rebels.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kisi	 Musalman	 meiñ	 na	 qarābat	 ka	 lihāz	
kareiñ		na	‘ahed	ka	aur	wohi	sarkash	haiñ.

arabicText: فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ ۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 if	 they	 repent and	 keep	 the	 prayer	
established	 and	 pay	 the	 charity,	 they	 are	
your	brothers	in	religion;	and	we	explain	
Our	 verses	 in	 detail	 for	 the	 people	 of	
knowledge.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 agar	 woh	 tauba	 kareiñ	 	 aur	 Namāz
qāim	 rakheiñ	 aur	 Zakāt deñ	 to	 woh	
tumhāre	 deeni	 bhai	 haiñ	 aur	 hum	
āayateiñ	mufassal	(Khol	khol)	bayān	karte	
haiñ	jānne	wāloñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: وَإِن نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ عَهْدِهِمْ وَطَعَنُوا۟ فِى دِينِكُمْ فَقَـٰتِلُوٓا۟ أَئِمَّةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ ۙ إِنَّهُمْ لَآ أَيْمَـٰنَ لَهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَنتَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	if	they	break	their	promises	after	making	a	treaty	and	malign	your	religion,	then	fight	the	
leaders	of	disbelief	- indeed	their	promises	are	nothing	- in	the	hope	that	they	may	desist.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	ahed	karke	apni	qasmeiñ	todeiñ	aur	tumhāre	deen	par	moñh	āayeñ	(e’aterāj	wa	t’an	
kareñ)	 to	 kufr	 ke	 sarghanoñ	 se	 lado	 be-shak	 	 unki	 qasmeiñ	 kuchh	 nahi	 is	 ummeed	 par	 ke	
shayad	woh	b’az	āayeñ.

arabicText: أَلَا تُقَـٰتِلُونَ قَوْمًۭا نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِإِخْرَاجِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَهُم بَدَءُوكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۚ أَتَخْشَوْنَهُمْ ۚ فَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخْشَوْهُ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Will	 you	 not	 fight	 the	 people	 who	 broke	 their	 promises,	 and	 intended	 to	 expel	 the	 Noble	
Messenger	whereas	 they	 had	 started	it?	Do	 you	 fear	 them?	 So	Allah has	more	 right	 that	 you	
should	fear	Him,	if	you	have	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	us	qaum	se	na	ladoge	 Jinhoñ	ne	apni	qasmeiñ	 todeiñ	aur	Rasool	ke	nikālne	ka	irāda	kiya	
halāñke	unhi	ki	taraf	se	pahel	huwi	hai	kya	un	se	darte	ho	to	Allah	is	ka	ziyada	mustahiq	hai	ke	
us	se	daro	agar	Imān	rakhte	ho.
